title: Riot Girl Tristana link wont work for euw
body: i have liked league on facebook and when i tried pressing euw it goes to another link and just gives a msg saying '' sorry riot girl tristana will be back later '' when i press other region links it works but not on euw- can anyone help me with this issue please? i can post screenshots if you want

replies.body: Ah, no worries I might be able to help here.  Can you confirm the summoner name and region of the account you're looking to get this added to?

Hey, sorry to hop on here, i just didnt want to create a new thread and figured it'd be more efficient if i could just ask you here , im having the same issue and wondered if you could rectify this for me too. My name is KingHarvz and the region is EUW :^)!
Hey I appreciate that!  She's been added to your account now.  :D
can you help me out too i have the same problem name is Dare123go on euw

Could I get it too?
Name's Tina Sprouto on EUW

Im having the same issue :(
Could i get it too?
my account: RobinL3L on EUW
